original_title: Yo nimo Kimyou na Monogatari: 2003 Spring Special
overview: Hosted by veteran comedian Tamori, "Bizarre Tales 2003 Spring Special" presents five tales.  1. Kao wo Nusumareta (My Face was Stolen) - starring Inagaki Goro  2. Rental Love - starring Iijima Naoko  3. Oikaketai (I want to Chase [Him/Her]) - starring Kyono Kotomi  4. Chozeikin Taisaku Satsujin Jiken (Countering Excessive Taxation Murder Case) - starring Nishimura Masahiko  5. Kage no Kuni (The Country of Shadows) - starring Sakurai Sachiko
title: Tales of the Bizarre: 2003 Spring Special
